page.title: 05COMMONSIDE HOUSING
page.content: MOST OF THE BUILDINGS IN THIS BLOCK WERE BUILT OVER 100 YEARS AGO, THE EXCEPTIONS BEING THE TEVIOTDALE LODGE HOTEL AND TEVIOTDALE COTTAGE WHICH WERE CONSTRUCTED IN THE 1930'S. THE HOTEL WAS BUILT AS A SHOOTING LODGE, THE COTTAGE FOR THE CHAUFFEUR. A SHED BEHIND THE COTTAGE WITH AN ENORMOUS DOOR HOUSED AN AUTOGIRO, A TYPE OF AIRCRAFT. IT TOOK OFF AND LANDED IN A NEIGHBOURING FIELD. IVY COTTAGE WAS DERELICT TWELVE YEARS AGO BUT WAS BOUGHT FROM THE ESTATE TO BE REBUILT AND ENLARGED. IT IS THE MOST MODERN BUILDING IN THIS BLOCK,BUILT AROUND THE SHELL OF A FORMER THREE-ROOMED COTTAGE. TEVIOTDALE IS A REMOTE RURAL AREA OUTWITH AN INDUSTRIAL BELT. IT IS LARGELY TENANTED FARMLAND, OWNED BY THE BUCCLEUCH ESTATES. THESE FACTORS EXPLAIN THE LACK OF NEW HOUSES.
